items.sentence: Have you asked anyone to feed your dog while you're in Boston?

If you don't want to get sick, you should put on your sweater.
I bought this book from the book shop in front of the station.
Some ideas are so stupid that only intellectuals believe them.
It would be wise to consider what might happen if we did that.
I'd never say this, but I can understand the intended meaning.

Tom was at his desk just a minute ago. I wonder where he went.
